channel.title: Can someone help me please
channel.description:
everytime i try to sign my client.jar
it says this :
unable to sign JAR file. Caused by: jarsigner: Certificate chain not found for: jelleplomp. Jelleplomp must reference a valid key entry containing a private key and corresponding public key certificate chain
Please help me !

item.title: Can someone help me please
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

add me on skype jelle-xxscape
i will give my details of tv

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me please
item.dc:creator: @Learning_Code Learning Code
item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

Yes I said I would help you, I will make the .Jar But THATS IT. You will have to upload it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me please

item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

can you help me ever time i try to launch my client.jar ( batch )
it says could not find or load main class.
can you help me please?

item.title: Can someone help me please
item.dc:creator: @Learning_Code Learning Code
item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

Make sure you Generate keystore first then select it from wherever you created it, if You have Teamviewer send me your ID and Pass I will show you that but I wont spoonfeed by making your webclient
